abstract: Merck said the Food and Drug Administration had rejected an application for a new sleeping pill called suvorexant, but would probably approve it in smaller doses.
snippet: Merck said the Food and Drug Administration had rejected an application for a new sleeping pill called suvorexant, but would probably approve it in smaller doses.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has rejected an application by Merck to sell a new sleeping pill, but indicated that it would probably approve the drug in lower doses.

headline.main: F.D.A. Prefers Smaller Dosage of Merck Sleep Drug
